sections.text: The purpose of this Act is to prevent, combat and reduce vehicle hijacking and related violent crime as well as motor vehicle theft in Illinois; to improve and support vehicle hijacking and motor vehicle theft law enforcement, prosecution and administration of vehicle hijacking and motor vehicle theft and insurance verification laws by establishing statewide planning capabilities for and coordination of financial resources.
